items.title: Nigerian separatist leader sentenced to life for terrorism
items.description: Nnamdi Kanu is found guilty of inciting violence as part of his campaign for a separate state in south-east Nigeria.

items.title: More than 250 arrested in Charlotte as US immigration crackdown escalates
items.description: Charlotte's Democratic leaders say border agents are "stoking fear" in the city.

items.title: What do we know about the Epstein files?
items.description: US President Donald Trump has approved a bill that orders the release of material from investigations into Epstein, the late sex offender.

items.title: Alleged mastermind behind Mexican mayor's murder arrested
items.description: The assassination of Uruapan mayor Carlos Manzo at a Day of the Dead ceremony triggered mass protests.

items.title: Trump signs bill ordering US justice department to release Epstein files
items.description: The bill gives the US Justice Department 30 days to release all the files in a searchable format.
